events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund for my recent order.
The case has been classified under refund as the customer requested money back.
The support ticket has been assigned to agent Sarah for further handling.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received?
Here is my order number 875423 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product delivered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help with resolving this so smoothly.
The refund has been initiated on our side and should appear in your account shortly.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and everything is satisfactory.
Since your refund was successful and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this case now.
